text: Valentina Vasilyevna Sidorova (; 4 May 1954 â€“ 9 June 2021) was a Soviet fencer. She won a gold medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics and a silver in the same event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. She was born in Moscow. Sidorova died on 9 June 2021 in Moscow, aged 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet fencers Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Valentina Sidorova
